tool_description:
All in one API for Various Termux Tools !

Category :
- Information Gathering Tools
- Phishing Tools
- Exploitation Tools
- Vulnerability Analysis Tools
- Social Eng. Tools
- Pasword Attack Tools
- Termux Style Tools
- Forensic Tools
- OS Installation Tools
- Termux Tools Installer
- Other Tools

Features :
- Name
- About / Description 
- Language 
- Author
- Command (single command)

* check About for Sample Response
name: Termux Tools API
title: Termux Tools API

api_list.name: Others Tools
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://termux-tools-api.p.rapidapi.com/Termux/otherTools"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "termux-tools-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
